short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you follow along with long-form text content by identifying and highlighting the sentence under your cursor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sentence Follower is a browser extension that helps you follow along with long-form text content by identifying and highlighting the sentence under your cursor.
